items.title: US futures higher as S&P 500, Nasdaq look set to nudge closer to all-time highs
items.description: The S&P 500 is currently less than a percent away from its all-time high, while the Nasdaq Composite is 1.1% away, and the Dow Jones Industrial Average is 4.6% below its record peak.

items.title: Hindustan Copper, Vedanta shares jump up to 5% on soaring copper prices globally
items.description: Copper prices shot up globally after record shipments to US, following Trump's tariff threats.

items.title: Taking Stock: Bulls power Nifty past 25,500 to near nine-month high, Sensex rallies 1,000 points on expiry day
items.description: More than 120 stocks on the BSE touched their 52-week highs, including Nuvama Wealth, Dalmia Bharat, Abbott India, Gillette India, Bharti Airtel, LT Finance, MCX India, Lloyds Metals, Aditya Birla Capital, HDFC Bank, Max Healthcare, Grasim Industries, among others.

items.title: FirstCry, Apar Industries, Newgen Software shares rise up to 17% amid high trading volumes
items.description: FirstCry-parent Brainbees Solutions saw their biggest single-day gain in several months by rising nearly 17% to trade at Rs 396.50 apiece

items.title: Gainers & Losers: Top 10 stocks that moved the most on June 26
items.description: At close, the Sensex was up 1,000.36 points or 1.21 percent at 83,755.87, and the Nifty was up 304.25 points or 1.21 percent at 25,549.00. About 1983 shares advanced, 1855 shares declined, and 151 shares unchanged.

items.title: Nifty Roars Past 25,500 As Bulls Party On; Bank Nifty Scales Record High|Closing Bell Live
items.description: Third straight day of gains .Nifty roars past 25,500 led by banks. Nifty less than 3% away from all-time high . Nifty Bank hits fresh all-time high. Broader markets underperform; Market Breadth even .Metals, oil & gas among top gainers . Realty, IT & pharma under selling pressure

items.title: Sensex surges 500 pts, Nifty near 25,400 amid easing Middle East tensions; Bank Nifty hits new record high
items.description: Immediate resistance for the Nifty sits inside the 25,310 - 25,360 zone and higher at 25,500, while immediate support rests between 24,960 and 25,010.

items.title: Brokers hope for relaxation as Sebi, exchanges likely to review norms defining a technical glitch
items.description: On the issue of technical glitch at brokers’ end, Sebi had introduced broad regulations in 2022 based on a working group’s recommendations. Exchanges later issued a circular which was last revised in March 2025, but brokers are seeking a fresh review and further relaxations.

items.title: UltraTech Cement Shares Climb 2% Amid Bullish Market Sentiment
items.description: UltraTech Cement, with its current price at Rs 11968.00, exhibits a positive trajectory reinforced by strong investor sentiment and consistent financial results.

items.title: Abbott India Shares Hit All-Time High of Rs 32,330 on NSE
items.description: With shares currently trading at Rs 32,255.00, Abbott India's financial health and market performance reflect investor confidence in the company.

items.title: Bharti Airtel Stock Among Top Nifty 50 Gainers, Jumps 2% in Today's Trading Session
items.description: With robust financials and a bullish investor sentiment, Bharti Airtel's trading performance underscores its significance within the Nifty 50.

items.title: Panasonic exits washing machine, refrigerator segments in India; Whirlpool, Voltas shares jump up to 5%
items.description: Significant layoffs will be part of Panasonic's restructuring exercise, with the number being in high double digits, Economic Times reported.

items.title: Tata Consultancy Services Among Top Losers on Nifty 50, Down 0.74% Today
items.description: With the current price at Rs 3,435.80, Tata Consultancy Services is currently among the top losers in the Nifty 50 during today's trading session.

items.title: DLF shares decline more than 2% in today's trading session
items.description: The current price of DLF shares is Rs 836.35, reflecting the impact of today's decline. Market participants will continue to monitor DLF's performance, considering both the challenges and opportunities within the real estate sector.

items.title: Bharti Airtel shares hit fresh all-time high, jump 8% in seven sessions: What lies ahead?
items.description: Bharti Airtel share price: The stock has jumped nearly 37% in the past one year, and over 263% in the past five years.

items.title: Nestlé India Board Approves 1:1 Bonus Share Issue
items.description: Nestlé India Board Approves 1:1 Bonus Share Issue

items.title: UPL share price falls 2.07% in today's trading session
items.description: UPL's revenue increased to Rs 15,573.00 Cr in March 2025. Net profit stood at Rs 1,106.00 Cr and EPS at 11.42.

items.title: Voltas share price rises over 2%, among top midcap gainers in today’s trading session
items.description: With the stock's current price at Rs 1,339.00, Voltas shows a positive movement in today's trading session.

items.title: Larsen & Toubro Shares See Marginal Gain in Today's Trading
items.description: With a current price of Rs 3,626.40, Larsen & Toubro is exhibiting a slightly positive trend in today's trading session, supported by overall bullish market sentiment.

items.title: Bharti Airtel stock gains to hit fresh 52-Week High of Rs 1,978 on NSE amid bullish sentiment
items.description: With the stock currently trading at Rs 1,976.80, the company remains a key player in the Indian stock market.

items.title: Hindustan Unilever Shares Show Slight Gains in Today's Trading Session
items.description: Moneycontrol's sentiment analysis, as of June 26, 2025, suggests a very bearish outlook for the stock.

items.title: Infosys shares rise marginally in today's session
items.description: With the stock's current price at Rs 1,616.90, Infosys has shown a marginal gain in today's session, supported by strong financial performance and a very bullish sentiment.
